meanings.definition: The inner layer of a cell membrane.
meanings.sent1: The endosarcs protect the cell membrane from damage.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the endosarcs to understand cell structure better.
meanings.sent3: The endosarcs in the cell membrane were throwing a party.
meanings.sent4: The endosarcs acted as the fortress guarding the cell membrane.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the endosarcs looked like tiny bodyguards surrounding the cell membrane.

meanings.definition: The inner layer of a cell wall.
meanings.sent1: The endosarcs provide strength to the cell wall.
meanings.sent2: Plants rely on endosarcs to maintain their structure.
meanings.sent3: The endosarcs in the cell wall were practicing yoga.
meanings.sent4: The endosarcs formed a sturdy shield around the cell wall.
meanings.sent5: In the garden, the endosarcs of the cell wall shimmered in the sunlight.
